Html:
Hi I can't understad how hi can draw a graph.
I'm using C# 2.0, Glee and Quickgraph

I can't understand How to convert the type AdjacencyGraph to GleeDefaultGraphPopulator

 AdjacencyGraph<int, TaggedEdge<int, string>> g = new AdjacencyGraph<int, TaggedEdge<int, string>>();

            int v1 = 1;
            int v2 = 2;

            g.AddVertex(v1);
            g.AddVertex(v2);

            TaggedEdge<int, string> e1 = new TaggedEdge<int, string>(v1, v2, "hello");

            g.AddEdge(e1);

GleeDefaultGraphPopulator<int, NamedEdge<string>> populator = (how can i put here?)

The constructor GleeGraphUtility.Create doesn't exist in the assembly using QuickGraph.Glee;

I use these assemblies:

using Microsoft.Glee;
using Microsoft.Glee.Drawing;
using Microsoft.Glee.GraphViewerGdi;
using System.Drawing;
using Microsoft;
using QuickGraph;
using QuickGraph.Glee;

Can someone put here an example? or help me?

Use the helper methods from GleeGraphExtensions:

    GleeDefaultGraphPopulator<int, NamedEdge<string>> populator = GleeGraphExtensions.CreateGleePopulator(g);

There are other overloads that let you customize the looks of the vertex/edges.
i have problem  GleeGraphExtensions doesn't exist. Can someone help me?
I have the same problem. Could you solved it? Thanks.

GleeGraphExtensions doesn't exist.
Can someone help me?
Yes there is no support of GLEE in this version and previous tutorials is not up to date.
